docs.title: Tier 1 (Calydor the Depraved)
docs.text:
• Warbeasts
  • Cover of Night
  • Kingdom Assault
  • To the Chamber
  • The Depraved
  • Revenge of the Warbeasts (Premium)

docs.title: Tier 2 (Z'uthmerak of Despair)
docs.text:
• The Awakening
  • The Despair
  • The Forgotten Ones
  • The Reckoning

docs.title: Cover of Night (Tier 1 – Level 2)
docs.text: Duration: 4 hours Requirements: None Items: Sleeping Potion (Phase 1) Regens: None Drops: None Clan Unlock Bonus: - Troop Attack: +0% - Troop Defense: +1% - Spy Attack: +0% - Spy Defense: +0%

docs.title: Phase 1:
docs.text:
• Water Supply (24,000): Item: Sleeping Potion
  • Stray Guards (9,000): Assassinate
  • Treasure: Steal to 0%

docs.title: 🧭 Strategy Tips
docs.text: • Coordinate with clan members to ensure all tasks are completed efficiently.

docs.title: ⚔️ Additional Notes
docs.text:
• Difficulty: Easy
  • Rewards: Gold
  • Next Battle: Kingdom Assault

docs.title: Kingdom Assault (Tier 1 – Level 3)
docs.text: Duration: 6 hours Requirements: None Items: None Regens: First Line (Phase 1), Second Line (Phase 1) Drops: Horn of Calydor Clan Unlock Bonus: None

docs.title: Phase 1:
docs.text:
• First Line (30,625): Attack and Assassinate First Line regenerates!
  • Second Line (18,375): Attack and Assassinate Second Line regenerates!
  • Kingdom Gate: Attack and Assassinate to 0%

docs.title: 🧭 Strategy Tips
docs.text: • Try to coordinate on taking down regenerating bars to finish mainbar.

docs.title: ⚔️ Additional Notes
docs.text:
• Difficulty: Easy
  • Rewards: Gold, Horn of Calydor
  • Next Battle: To the Chamber

docs.title: Revenge of the Warbeasts (Tier 1 – Premium)
docs.text: Duration: 12 hours Requirements: None Items: Horn of Calydor (Phase 1) Regens: None Drops: Seal of the Damned Clan Unlock Bonus: None

docs.title: Phase 1:
docs.text:
• Calydor's Corpse: Item: Horn of Calydor
  • Health: Attack and Assassinate to 90%

docs.title: Phase 2:
docs.text:
• Boar Brigade (10,500): Attack
  • Deadly Tusks (10,500): Assassinate
  • Health: Attack and Assassinate to 0%

docs.title: 🧭 Strategy Tips
docs.text:
• Only one clan member needs to use the Horn of Calydor to initiate the battle.
  • Coordinate with clan members to efficiently complete tasks.
  • Prioritize attacking and assassinating Health in both phases.

docs.title: ⚔️ Additional Notes
docs.text:
• Difficulty: Easy
  • Rewards: Gold, Seal of the Damned
  • Next Battle: The Awakening

docs.title: The Depraved (Tier 1 – Level 5)
docs.text: Duration: 12 hours Requirements: None Items: Sleeping Potion (Phase 1) Regens: Alertness (Phase 1), Health (Phase 1 & 2) Drops: Horn of Calydor, Seal of the Damned Clan Unlock Bonus: None

docs.title: Phase 1:
docs.text:
• Alertness (120,000): Item: Sleeping Potion Alertness regenerates every 2 minutes!
  • Undiscovered Weakness (19,500): Scout
  • Health: Attack and Assassinate to 80% Health regenerates 2% every 2 minutes!

docs.title: Phase 2:
docs.text:
• Tusks (52,500): Attack and Assassinate
  • Horns (52,500): Attack and Assassinate
  • Hide (31,500): Attack and Assassinate
  • Hooves (21,000): Attack and Assassinate
  • Eyes (10,500): Attack and Assassinate
  • Health: Attack and Assassinate to 0% Health regenerates 2% every 2 minutes!

docs.title: 🧭 Strategy Tips
docs.text:
• Use Sleeping Potion on Alertness to disable regeneration.
  • Coordinate with clan members to efficiently complete tasks.
  • Prioritize attacking and assassinating Health in Phase 1.

docs.title: ⚔️ Additional Notes
docs.text:
• Difficulty: Easy
  • Rewards: Gold, Horn of Calydor, Seal of the Damned
  • Next Battle: Revenge of the Warbeasts

docs.title: To the Chamber (Tier 1 – Level 4)
docs.text: Duration: 9 hours Requirements: None Items: Mist of Confusion (Phase 1) Regens: Guards of the Keep (Phase 2) Drops: Horn of Calydor Clan Unlock Bonus: None

docs.title: Phase 1:
docs.text:
• Foot Soldiers (72,000): Attack and Assassinate
  • Soldiers Co-ordination (72,000): Item: Mist of Confusion
  • Keys Remaining: Steal to 70%

docs.title: Phase 2:
docs.text:
• Guards of the Keep (202,500): Attack and Assassinate Guards regenerate every 5 minutes!
  • Keys Remaining: Steal to 0%

docs.title: 🧭 Strategy Tips
docs.text:
• Assassinate works best on Guards of the Keep.
  • Keep some spies in assassination phases to steal on mainbar.

docs.title: ⚔️ Additional Notes
docs.text:
• Difficulty: Easy
  • Rewards: Gold, Horn of Calydor
  • Next Battle: The Depraved

docs.title: Warbeasts (Tier 1 – Level 1)
docs.text: Duration: 3 hours Requirements: None Items: None Regens: None Drops: Seal of the Damned Clan Unlock Bonus: None

docs.title: Phase 1:
docs.text:
• Defenses (15,000): Attack and Assassinate
  • Intelligence Left to Gather: Scout to 0%

docs.title: 🧭 Strategy Tips
docs.text: • Keep some spies in assassination phase to scout on mainbar

docs.title: ⚔️ Additional Notes
docs.text:
• Difficulty: Easy
  • Rewards: Gold, Seal of the Damned
  • Next Battle: Cover of Night

docs.title: The Awakening (Tier 2 – Level 1)
docs.text: Duration: 4 hours Requirements: None Items: None Regens: None Drops: None Clan Unlock Bonus: None

docs.title: Phase 1:
docs.text: • Investigation Remaining: Scout to 25%

docs.title: Phase 2:
docs.text:
• Port Side Tentacle (9,000): Attack and Assassinate
  • Starboard Side Tentacle (1,500): Attack and Assassinate
  • Investigation Remaining: Scout to 0%

docs.title: 🧭 Strategy Tips
docs.text:
• Coordinate with clan members to ensure all tasks are completed efficiently.
  • Use minimal items to conserve resources for higher-tier battles.

docs.title: ⚔️ Additional Notes
docs.text:
• Difficulty: Easy
  • Rewards: Gold
  • Next Battle: The Despair

docs.title: The Despair (Tier 2 – Level 2)
docs.text: Duration: 6 hours Requirements: None Items: None Regens: Massive Tentacles (Phase 2) Drops: None Clan Unlock Bonus: None

docs.title: Phase 1:
docs.text: • Massive Tentacles: Attack and Assassinate to 20%

docs.title: Phase 2:
docs.text:
• Sea of Tentacles (56,550): Attack and Assassinate
  • Massive Tentacles: Attack and Assassinate to 0% Massive Tentacles regenerate 1% every 5 minutes!

docs.title: 🧭 Strategy Tips
docs.text:
• Coordinate with clan members to ensure all tasks are completed efficiently.
  • Keep some spies in assassination phase to scout on mainbar.

docs.title: ⚔️ Additional Notes
docs.text:
• Difficulty: Easy
  • Rewards: Gold
  • Next Battle: The Forgotten Ones

docs.title: The Forgotten Ones (Tier 2 – Level 1)
docs.text: Duration: 6 hours Requirements: None Items: Bribery Gem (Phase 1) Regens: None Drops: None Clan Unlock Bonus: None

docs.title: Phase 1:
docs.text:
• Nerissius the Wanderer (32,400):
  • Item: Bribery Gem to 50% (16,200/32,400)
  • Assassinate remaining 50% (0/32,400)
  • Seraphis the Great (64,800): Attack and Assassinate
  • Elestrial the Just (17,520): Scout
  • Celest the Angelic (7,800): Steal
  • Deviticus the Savior (100%): Attack and Assassinate to 0%

docs.title: 🧭 Strategy Tips
docs.text:
• Coordinate with clan members to efficiently complete tasks.
  • Prioritize attacking and assassinating Deviticus the Savior.

docs.title: ⚔️ Additional Notes
docs.text:
• Difficulty: Easy
  • Rewards: Gold
  • Next Battle: The Reckoning

docs.title: The Reckoning (Tier 3 – Level 1)
docs.text: Duration: 12 hours Requirements: None Items: Healing Aura (Phase 2) Regens: Massive Tentacles (Phase 2) Drops: Seal of the Damned, Hooves of Destruction Clan Unlock Bonus: None

docs.title: Phase 1:
docs.text:
• Sea of Tentacles (Port) (189,000): Attack and Assassinate
  • Sea of Tentacles (Starboard) (189,000): Attack and Assassinate
  • Head of Z'uthmerak: Attack and Assassinate to 75%

docs.title: Phase 2:
docs.text:
• Massive Tentacles (Port) (36,000): Item: Healing Aura
  • Massive Tentacles (Starboard) (36,000): Item: Healing Aura Massive Tentacles regenerates 5% (1,800) every 2 minutes!
  • Head of Z'uthmerak: Attack and Assassinate to 10% Keep Massive Tentacles at zero to avoid failed attacks!

docs.title: Phase 3:
docs.text: • Head of Z'uthmerak: Attack and Assassinate to 0%

docs.title: 🧭 Strategy Tips
docs.text:
• Use Healing Aura on Sea of Tentacles and Massive Tentacles, keep an eye on regeneration.
  • Coordinate with clan members to efficiently complete tasks.
  • Prioritize attacking and assassinating Head of Z'uthmerak.

docs.title: ⚔️ Additional Notes
docs.text:
• Difficulty: Easy
  • Rewards: Gold, Seal of the Damned, Hooves of Destruction
  • Next Battle: Abandoned Kingdom

docs.title: Abandoned Kingdom (Tier 3 – Level 2)
docs.text: Duration: 3 hours Requirements: None Items: None Regens: None Drops: None Clan Unlock Bonus: None

docs.title: Phase 1 of 2:
docs.text:
• Unscouted Lands (13,500): Scout
  • Troll Minions: Attack and Assassinate to 50%

docs.title: Phase 2 of 2:
docs.text:
• Troll Shield (18,500): Attack and Assassinate
  • Troll Minions: Attack and Assassinate to 0%

docs.title: 🧭 Strategy Tips
docs.text:
• Scout Unscouted Lands early to reveal enemy structure.
  • Focus on reducing Troll Minions to 50% before completing Phase 1.
  • In Phase 2, eliminate the Troll Shield first to expose the Minions for final elimination.
  • Coordination with clan members ensures efficient takedowns.

docs.title: ⚔️ Additional Notes
docs.text:
• Difficulty: Easy
  • Rewards: Gold
  • Next Battle: Foreign Territories

docs.title: Battle Royale (Tier 3 – Level 3)
docs.text: Duration: 9 hours Requirements: None Items: Elixir of Rage (Phase 3) Regens: None Drops: None Clan Unlock Bonus: None

docs.title: Phase 1 of 3:
docs.text: • Blockade: Attack and Assassinate to 95%

docs.title: Phase 2 of 3:
docs.text:
• Snokee the Troll (45,350): Attack and Assassinate
  • Blockade: Attack and Assassinate to 50%

docs.title: Phase 3 of 3:
docs.text:
• The Shield (45,300): Attack and Assassinate
  • Phlighton the Troll (90,700): Attack and Assassinate
  • Defensive Stance (21,600): Item: Elixir of Rage
  • Ghostfang the Troll (181,000): Attack and Assassinate
  • Blockade: Attack and Assassinate to 0%

docs.title: 🧭 Strategy Tips
docs.text:
• Phase 1: Focus on quickly reducing the Blockade to 95%.
  • Phase 2: Eliminate Snokee first, then reduce the Blockade to 50%.
  • Phase 3: Attack The Shield, Phlighton, and Ghostfang in order; use the Elixir of Rage on Defensive Stance strategically to exploit its effects.

docs.title: ⚔️ Additional Notes
docs.text:
• Difficulty: Medium
  • Rewards: Gold
  • Next Battle: Origins

docs.title: Foreign Territories (Tier 3 – Level 2)
docs.text: Duration: 6 hours Requirements: None Items: None Regens: None Drops: None Clan Unlock Bonus: None

docs.title: Phase 1 of 1:
docs.text:
• The Eastern Territories (6,750): Scout
  • The Western Territories (17,550): Scout
  • The Northern Territories: Scout to 0%

docs.title: 🧭 Strategy Tips
docs.text:
• Scout each region efficiently, starting with Eastern, then Western, and finally Northern Territories.
  • Total scouting goal: Northern Territories to 0%.
  • Coordinate with your clan for focused and organized scouting.

docs.title: ⚔️ Additional Notes
docs.text:
• Difficulty: Easy
  • Rewards: Gold
  • Next Battle: Battle Royale

docs.title: Origins (Tier 4 – Level 1)
docs.text: Duration: 12 hours Requirements: None Items: Scroll of the Mage's Eye (Phase 3) Regens: Usaris's Mace (Phase 3), Sol Spell (Phase 3) Drops: Hystricidae Helmet Clan Unlock Bonus: None

docs.title: Phase 1 of 3:
docs.text: • Health: Attack and Assassinate to 90%

docs.title: Phase 2 of 3:
docs.text:
• Usaris's Mace (150,000): Attack and Assassinate
  • Health: Attack and Assassinate to 25%

docs.title: Phase 3 of 3:
docs.text:
• Usaris's Mace (150,000): Attack and Assassinate Usaris's Mace regenerates 1,500 every 2 minutes!
  • Sol Spell (48,000): Item: Scroll of the Mage's Eye Sol Spell regenerates 480 every 3 minutes!
  • Health: Attack and Assassinate to 0% Keep Sol Spell and Usaris's Mace at zero to avoid failed attacks!

docs.title: 🧭 Strategy Tips
docs.text:
• Phase 1: Attack Health to 90%.
  • Phase 2: Attack and Assassinate Usaris's Mace, then reduce Health to 25%.
  • Phase 3: Attack and Assassinate Usaris's Mace again; use Scroll of the Mage's Eye on Sol Spell to prevent regeneration; finally, attack and assassinate Health to 0%.
  • Keep an eye on the regeneration of Usaris's Mace and Sol Spell to avoid failed attacks.

docs.title: ⚔️ Additional Notes
docs.text:
• Difficulty: Medium
  • Rewards: Gold
  • Next Battle: Evanescence
